papers.title: Several classes of new weakly regular bent functions outside ℛℱ, their duals and some related (minimal) codes with few weights
papers.authors: Xiaoni Du, Wengang Jin, Sihem Mesnager
papers.abstract: Boosted by cryptography and coding theory applications and rich connections to objects from geometry and combinatorics, bent functions and related functions developed into a lively research area. In the mid-seventies, Rothaus initially introduced bent functions in the Boolean case, but later, they extended in the p -ary case where p is any prime. Such an extension brought more rich connections to bent functions. In addition to the theory of Fourier transform, handling p -ary bent functions (where p is an odd prime), analyzing their properties and designing them require using the theory of cyclotomic ﬁelds. Such a family is classiﬁed into weakly regular bent and regular bent. Compared to the Boolean case, the class of p -ary bent functions inherits a much larger variety of properties. For example, it contains theclassofdual-bentfunctionsasapropersubclass,whichagainincludesweaklyregularbent functionsasapropersubclass.Weaklyregularbentfunctionscanalsobeemployedinmany domains.Inparticular,theyhavebeenwidelyusedindesigninggoodlinearcodesforseveral applications(suchassecretsharingandtwo-partycomputation),associationschemes,and stronglyregulargraphs.Moreexplorationisstillneededdespitealotofinterestandattention inthistopictoincreaseourknowledgeofbentfunctionsanddesignthem.Inparticular,only a few constructions of weakly regular bent functions have been presented in the literature. Nice construction methods of these functions have been given by Tang et al (IEEE Trans

papers.title: New MDS entanglement-assisted quantum codes from MDS Hermitian self-orthogonal codes
papers.authors: Hao Chen
papers.abstract: The intersection $$\textbf{C}\cap \textbf{C}^{\perp _H}$$ C ∩ C ⊥ H of a linear code $$\textbf{C} \subset \textbf{F}_{q^2}^n$$ C ⊂ F q 2 n and its Hermitian dual $$\textbf{C}^{\perp _H}$$ C ⊥ H is called the Hermitian hull of this code. A linear code $$\textbf{C} \subset \textbf{F}_{q^2}^n$$ C ⊂ F q 2 n satisfying $$\textbf{C} \subset \textbf{C}^{\perp _H}$$ C ⊂ C ⊥ H is called Hermitian self-orthogonal. Many Hermitian self-orthogonal codes were given for the construction of MDS quantum error correction codes (QECCs). In this paper we prove that for a nonnegative integer h satisfying $$0 \le h \le k$$ 0 ≤ h ≤ k , a linear Hermitian self-orthogonal $$[n, k]_{q^2}$$ [ n , k ] q 2 code is equivalent to a linear h -dimension Hermitian hull code. Therefore a lot of new MDS entanglement-assisted quantum error correction (EAQEC) codes can be constructed from previous known Hermitian self-orthogonal codes. Actually our method shows that previous constructed quantum MDS codes from Hermitian self-orthogonal codes can be transformed to MDS entanglement-assisted quantum codes with nonzero consumption parameter c directly. We prove that MDS EAQEC $$[[n, k, d; c]]_q$$ [ [ n , k , d ; c ] ] q codes with nonzero c parameters and $$d\le \frac{n+2}{2}$$ d ≤ n + 2 2 exist for arbitrary length n satisfying $$n \le q^2+1$$ n ≤ q 2 + 1 . Moreover any QECC constructed from k -dimensional Hermitian self-orthogonal codes can be transformed to k different EAQEC codes. We also prove that MDS entanglement-assisted quantum codes exist for all lengths $$n\le q^2+1$$ n ≤ q 2 + 1 .
papers.title_zh: 基于MDS厄米自正交码的新MDS纠缠辅助量子码
papers.abstract_zh: 线性码$ $ \ textbf { c } \ cap \textbf{c}^{\perp _ h } $ $ c∩c⊥h的交集$ $ \ textbf { c } \子集\textbf{F}_{q^2}^n$$ C ⊂ F q 2 n及其厄米对偶$$\textbf{C}^{\perp _H}$$ C ⊥ H称为这个码的厄米壳。一个线性码$ $ \ textbf { c } \子集\textbf{F}_{q^2}^n$$ C ⊂ F q 2 n满足$ $ \ textbf { c } \子集\textbf{C}^{\perp _H}$$ C ⊂ C ⊥ H称为埃尔米特自正交。许多厄米自正交码被用来构造MDS量子纠错码。本文证明了对于满足$$0 \le h \le k$$ 0 ≤ h ≤ k的非负整数h，线性埃尔米特自正交$[n，k]_{q^2}$$ [ n，k ] q 2码等价于线性h维埃尔米特hull码。因此，许多新的MDS纠缠辅助量子纠错(EAQEC)码可以由以前已知的厄米自正交码构造。实际上，我们的方法表明，以前从厄米自正交码构造的量子MDS码可以直接转化为具有非零消耗参数c的MDS纠缠辅助量子码。我们证明MDS EAQEC $$[[n，k，d；c]]_q$$ [ [ n，k，d；c ] ]对于满足$$n \le q^2+1$$ n ≤ q 2 + 1的任意长度n，存在c参数非零且$$d\le \frac{n+2}{2}$$ d ≤ n + 2的q码。此外，由k维厄米自正交码构造的任何QECC都可以变换成k个不同的EAQEC码。我们还证明了MDS纠缠辅助量子码对于所有长度＄＄n \ le q^2+1$$ n≤Q2+1都存在。

papers.title: Indifferentiable hashing to ordinary elliptic ${\mathbb {F}}_{\!q}$-curves of j=0 with the cost of one exponentiation in ${\mathbb {F}}_{\!q}$
papers.authors: Dmitrii Koshelev
papers.abstract: Let F q be a ﬁnite ﬁeld and E b : y 2 = x 3 + b be an ordinary (i.e., non-supersingular) elliptic curve (of j -invariant 0) such that √ b ∈ F q and q (cid:4)≡ 1 ( mod 27 ) . For example, these conditions are fulﬁlled for the curve BLS12-381 ( b = 4). It is a de facto standard in the real-world pairing-based cryptography at the moment. This article provides a new constant-time hash function H : { 0 , 1 } ∗ → E b ( F q ) indifferentiable from a random oracle. Its main advantage is the fact that H computes only one exponentiation in F q . In comparison, the previous fastest constant-time indifferentiable hash functions to E b ( F q ) compute two exponentiations in F q . In particular, applying H to the widely used BLS multi-signature with m different messages, the veriﬁer should perform only m exponentiations rather than 2 m ones during the hashing phase.
papers.title_zh: 对普通椭圆{ \ mathbb { F } } _ { \！q } $-j = 0的曲线，以${\mathbb {F}}_{\！q}$
papers.abstract_zh: 设F q是一个有限域，E b:y ^ 2 = x ^ 3+b是一条普通(即非超奇异)椭圆曲线(j不变量为0 ),因此√ b ∈ F q和q (cid:4)≡ 1 ( mod 27)。例如，曲线BLS12-381 ( b = 4)满足这些条件。目前，它是现实世界中基于配对的加密技术的事实上的标准。本文给出了一个新的常数时间散列函数H : { 0，1 }∫→E b(F q ),它与随机预言不可微。它的主要优点是，H在F q中只计算一次取幂运算。相比之下，E b ( F q)之前最快的常数时间不可微哈希函数在F q中计算两次取幂运算。特别是，将H应用于广泛使用的具有m个不同消息的BLS多重签名，验证者在哈希阶段应该只执行m次取幂运算，而不是2 m次。

papers.title: On the list decodability of rank-metric codes containing Gabidulin codes
papers.authors: Paolo Santonastaso, Ferdinando Zullo
papers.abstract: Wachter-Zeh (IEEE Trans Inf Theory 59(11):7268–7276, 2013), and later together with Raviv (IEEE Trans Inf Theory 62(4):1605–1615, 2016), proved that Gabidulin codes cannot be efficiently list decoded for any radius τ\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\tau $$\end{document}, providing that τ\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$\tau $$\end{document} is large enough. Also, they proved that there are infinitely many choices of the parameters for which Gabidulin codes cannot be efficiently list decoded at all. Subsequently, in Trombetti and Zullo (IEEE Trans Inf Theory 66(9):5379–5386, 2020) these results have been extended to the family of generalized Gabidulin codes and to further family of MRD-codes. In this paper, we provide bounds on the list size of rank-metric codes containing generalized Gabidulin codes in order to determine whether or not a polynomial-time list decoding algorithm exists. We detect several families of rank-metric codes containing a generalized Gabidulin code as subcode which cannot be efficiently list decoded for any radius large enough and families of rank-metric codes which cannot be efficiently list decoded. These results suggest that rank-metric codes which are Fqm\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$${{\mathbb {F}}}_{q^m}$$\end{document}-linear or that contains a (power of) generalized Gabidulin code cannot be efficiently list decoded for large values of the radius.
papers.abstract_zh: 沃希特-泽赫(IEEE Trans Inf Theory 59(11):7268–7276，2013)以及后来与拉维夫(IEEE Trans Inf Theory 62(4):1605–1615，2016)一起证明了加比杜林码不能对任何半径τ\ document class[12pt]{ minimal } \ use package { AMS math } \ use package { was sym } \ use package { AMS fonts } \ use package { AMS symb } \ use package { AMS }此外，他们证明了存在无限多的参数选择，对于这些参数，加比杜林码根本不能被有效地列表解码。随后，在特龙贝蒂和祖洛(IEEE Trans Inf Theory 66(9):5379–5386，2020)中，这些结果被扩展到广义Gabidulin码族和MRD码族。在本文中，我们提供了包含广义Gabidulin码的秩度量码的列表大小的界限，以确定多项式时间列表解码算法是否存在。我们检测了几个包含作为子码的广义加比杜林码的秩度量码族，其不能被有效地对任何足够大的半径进行列表解码，并且检测了不能被有效地列表解码的秩度量码族。这些结果表明，fqm \ document class[12pt]{ minimal } \ use package { AMS math } \ use package { was sym } \ use package { AMS fonts } \ use package { AMS sy } \ use package { AMS SFS } \ use package { up Greek } \ set length { \ oddsidemargin } {-69pt } \ begin { document } $ { { \ mathbb {f}}}_{q^m}$$\end{document}-linear }或包含(幂)广义加比杜林码的秩度量码不能被有效地列表解码

papers.title: On the linearity and classification of ${\mathbb {Z}}_{p^s}$-linear generalized hadamard codes
papers.authors: Dipak K. Bhunia, Cristina Fernández-Córdoba, Mercè Villanueva
papers.abstract: Z p s -additive codes of length n are subgroups of Z np s , and can be seen as a generalization of linear codes over Z 2 , Z 4 , or Z 2 s in general. A Z p s -linear generalized Hadamard (GH) code is a GH code over Z p which is the image of a Z p s -additive code by a generalized Gray map. In this paper, we generalize some known results for Z p s -linear GH codes with p = 2 to any odd prime p . First, we show some results related to the generalized Carlet’s Gray map. Then, by using an iterative construction of Z p s -additive GH codes of type ( n ; t 1 , . . . , t s ) , we show for which types the corresponding Z p s -linear GH codes of length p t are nonlinear over Z p . For these codes, we compute the kernel and its dimension, which allow us to give a partial classiﬁcation. The obtained results for p ≥ 3 are different from the case with p = 2. Finally, the exact number of non-equivalent such codes is given for an inﬁnite number of values of s , t , and any p ≥ 2; by using also the rank as an invariant in some speciﬁc cases.
papers.title_zh: 关于＄{ \ mathbb {z}}_{p^s}$-linear广义哈达玛码的线性和分类
papers.abstract_zh: 长度为n的Z p s-加性码是Z np s的子群，一般可以看作Z ^ 2，Z ^ 4或Z ^ 2s上线性码的推广。Z p-s-线性广义Hadamard (GH)码是ZP上的GH码，它是ZP-s-加法码的广义Gray映射的象。本文将p = 2的Z p s-线性GH码的一些已知结果推广到任意奇素数p。首先，我们给出了与广义Carlet Gray映射相关的一些结果。然后，通过使用类型为(n；t 1，.。。，t s)，我们显示了哪些类型的对应的长度为p t的zps-线性GH码在Z p上是非线性的。对于这些码，我们计算了核及其维数，这允许我们给出部分分类。当p ≥ 3时，所得结果与p = 2时不同。最后，对于s、t和任何p ≥ 2的有限数量的值，给出了不等价的这种代码的确切数量；在某些特殊情况下，也使用秩作为不变量。

papers.title: An infinite family of antiprimitive cyclic codes supporting Steiner systems S(3, 8, 7m+1)
papers.authors: Can Xiang, Chunming Tang, Qi Liu
papers.abstract: Coding theory and combinatorial t -designs have close connections and interesting interplay. One of the major approaches to the construction of combinatorial t-designs is the employment of error-correcting codes. As we all known, some t -designs have been constructed with this approach by using certain linear codes in recent years. However, only a small number of inﬁnite families of cyclic codes holding an inﬁnite family of 3-designs are reported in the literature. The objective of this paper is to study an inﬁnite family of antiprimitive cyclic codes and determine their parameters. By the parameters of these codes and their dual, some inﬁnite family of 3-designs are presented and their parameters are also explicitly determined. In particular, the complements of the supports of the minimum weight codewords in the studied cyclic code form a Steiner system. Furthermore, we show that the inﬁnite family of cyclic codes admit 3-transitive automorphism groups.
papers.abstract_zh: 编码理论和组合t设计有着密切的联系和有趣的相互作用。构造组合t-设计的主要方法之一是使用纠错码。众所周知，近年来，一些t-设计已经用这种方法通过使用某些线性码来构造。然而，文献中只报道了少量具有3种设计的无限循环码族。本文的目的是研究一类有限的反本原循环码，并确定它们的参数。通过这些代码及其对偶的参数，提出了一些3-设计的无限族，并且也明确地确定了它们的参数。特别地，在所研究的循环码中，最小重量码字的支持的补码形成了Steiner系统。此外，我们证明了循环码的有限族允许3-传递自同构群。
papers.title_zh: 支持Steiner系统S(3，8，7m+1)的无限反本原循环码族

papers.title: On α-points of q-analogs of the Fano plane
papers.authors: Michael Kiermaier
papers.abstract: Arguably, the most important open problem in the theory of $q$-analogs of designs is the question for the existence of a $q$-analog $D$ of the Fano plane. It is undecided for every single prime power value $q \geq 2$. A point $P$ is called an $\alpha$-point of $D$ if the derived design of $D$ in $P$ is a geometric spread. In 1996, Simon Thomas has shown that there must always exist at least one non-$\alpha$-point. For the binary case $q = 2$, Olof Heden and Papa Sissokho have improved this result in 2016 by showing that the non-$\alpha$-points must form a blocking set with respect to the hyperplanes. In this article, we show that a hyperplane consisting only of $\alpha$-points implies the existence of a partiton of the symplectic generalized quadrangle $W(q)$ into spreads. As a consequence, the statement of Heden and Sissokho is generalized to all primes $q$ and all even values of $q$.
papers.title_zh: 关于Fano平面q-相似的α点
papers.abstract_zh: 可以说，设计的$ q $-模拟理论中最重要的公开问题是Fano平面的$ q $-模拟$D$的存在性问题。对于每一个素数幂值$q \geq 2$都是未定的。如果$P$中的$D$的派生设计是几何分布，则点$P$称为$D$的$ \ alpha $-点。在1996年，西蒙·托马斯已经表明，必须始终存在至少一个非$ \阿尔法$-点。对于二元情况$q = 2$，Olof Heden和Papa Sissokho在2016年改进了这个结果，表明非$ \ alpha $-点必须形成关于超平面的阻塞集。在这篇文章中，我们证明了仅由$ \ alpha $-点组成的超平面隐含着辛广义四边形$W(q)$的一个分支的存在。因此，Heden和Sissokho的陈述被推广到所有的素数$q$和所有的偶数值$q$。

papers.title: Linear complexity over ${\mathbb {F}_{{q}}}$ and 2-adic complexity of a class of binary generalized cyclotomic sequences with good autocorrelation
papers.authors: Yan Wang, Xilin Han, Weiqiong Wang, Ziling Heng
papers.abstract: A class of binary sequences with period $2p$ is constructed using generalized cyclotomic classes, and their linear complexity, minimal polynomial over ${\mathbb{F}_{{q}}}$ as well as 2-adic complexity are determined using Gauss period and group ring theory. The results show that the linear complexity of these sequences attains the maximum when $p\equiv \pm 1(\bmod~8)$ and is equal to {$p$+1} when $p\equiv \pm 3(\bmod~8)$ over extension field. Moreover, the 2-adic complexity of these sequences is maximum. According to Berlekamp-Massey(B-M) algorithm and the rational approximation algorithm(RAA), these sequences have quite good cryptographyic properties in the aspect of linear complexity and 2-adic complexity.
papers.title_zh: 一类具有良好自相关性的二元广义分圆序列在${\mathbb {F}_{{q}}}$上的线性复杂度和2-adic复杂度
papers.abstract_zh: 利用广义分圆类构造了一类周期为$2p$的二元序列，并利用高斯周期和群环理论确定了它们的线性复杂度、在${\mathbb{F}_{{q}}}$上的最小多项式以及2-adic复杂度。结果表明，当$p\equiv \pm 1(\bmod~8)$时，这些序列的线性复杂度达到最大，当$p\equiv \pm 3(\bmod~8)$时，其线性复杂度等于{$p$+1}。此外，这些序列的2-adic复杂度是最大的。根据Berlekamp-Massey(B-M)算法和有理逼近算法(RAA ),这些序列在线性复杂度和2-adic复杂度方面具有很好的密码学性质。

papers.title: Linear ℓ-intersection pairs of codes and their applications
papers.authors: Kenza Guenda, T. Aaron Gulliver, Somphong Jitman, Satanan Thipworawimon
papers.abstract: In this paper, a linear (cid:2) -intersection pair of codes is introduced as a generalization of linear complementary pairs of codes. Two linear codes are said to be a linear (cid:2) -intersection pair if their intersection has dimension (cid:2) . Characterizations and constructions of such pairs of codes are given in terms of the corresponding generator and parity-check matrices. Linear (cid:2) -intersection pairs of MDS codes over F q of length up to q + 1 are given for all possible parameters. As an application, linear (cid:2) -intersection pairs of codes are used to construct entanglement-assisted quantum error correcting codes. This provides a large number of new MDS entanglement-assisted quantum error correcting codes.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文引入了线性(cid:2)-交码对，作为线性互补码对的推广。两个线性码称为线性(cid:2)-交集对，如果它们的交集有维数(cid:2)。根据相应的生成矩阵和奇偶校验矩阵给出了这种码对的特征和构造。对于所有可能的参数，给出了长度达到q + 1的F q上的MDS码的线性(cid:2)-交集对。作为应用，线性(cid:2)-交集码对被用来构造纠缠辅助的量子纠错码。这提供了大量新的MDS纠缠辅助量子纠错码。
papers.title_zh: 线性ℓ-intersection码对及其应用

papers.title: Access balancing in storage systems by labeling partial Steiner systems
papers.authors: Yeow Meng Chee, Charles J. Colbourn, Hoang Dau, Ryan Gabrys, Alan C. H. Ling, Dylan Lusi, Olgica Milenkovic
papers.abstract: Storage architectures ranging from minimum bandwidth regenerating encoded distributed storage systems to declustered-parity RAIDs can employ dense partial Steiner systems to support fast reads, writes, and recovery of failed storage units. To enhance performance, popularities of the data items should be taken into account to make frequencies of accesses to storage units as uniform as possible. A combinatorial model ranks items by popularity and assigns data items to elements in a dense partial Steiner system so that the sums of ranks of the elements in each block are as equal as possible. By developing necessary conditions in terms of independent sets, we demonstrate that certain Steiner systems must have a much larger difference between the largest and smallest block sums than is dictated by an elementary lower bound. In contrast, we also show that certain dense partial S(t,t+1,v)\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$S(t,t+1,v)$$\end{document} designs can be labeled to realize the elementary lower bound. Furthermore, we prove that for every admissible order v, there is a Steiner triple system (S(2, 3, v)) whose largest difference in block sums is within an additive constant of the lower bound.
papers.abstract_zh: 从最小带宽再生编码分布式存储系统到去簇奇偶校验RAIDs的存储架构可以采用密集部分Steiner系统来支持故障存储单元的快速读取、写入和恢复。为了提高性能，应该考虑数据项的流行度，以使对存储单元的访问频率尽可能一致。组合模型根据流行度对项目进行排序，并将数据项分配给稠密部分Steiner系统中的元素，使得每个块中的元素的排序总和尽可能相等。通过发展独立集的必要条件，我们证明了某些Steiner系统的最大和最小块和之间的差必须比初等下界所规定的差大得多。作为对比，我们还证明了某些稠密部分S(t，t+1，v)\ document class[12pt]{ minimal } \ use package { AMS math } \ use package { was sym } \ use package { AMS fonts } \ use package { AMS sy } \ use package { AMS SFS } \ use package { up Greek } \ set length { \ oddsidemargin } {-69pt } \ begin { document } $ $ S(t，t+1，v)$ \ end { document }此外，我们证明了对于每个容许阶v，存在一个Steiner三系(S(2，3，v))，其块和的最大差在下界的一个加常数内。

papers.title: Several classes of linear codes with a few weights from defining sets over $$\mathbb {F}_p+u\mathbb {F}_p$$ F p + u F p
papers.authors: Haibo Liu, Qunying Liao
papers.abstract: Recently,linearcodeswithafewweightshavebeenextensivelystudiedduetotheir applications in secret sharing schemes, authentication codes, constant composition codes. Results have shown that some optimal codes can be acquired if the deﬁning sets are well chosen over ﬁnite ﬁelds. In this paper, we investigate the Lee-weight distribution of linear codes over the ring F p + u F p ( p is an odd prime) based on deﬁning sets by employing exponential sums. We then determine the explicit complete weight enumerator for the images of these linear codes under the Gray map. A class of constant weight codes that meets the Griesmer bound for constructing optimal constant composition codes achieving the LVFC bound is also presented.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近，八种线性码在秘密共享方案、认证码、常数合成码等方面的应用得到了广泛的研究。结果表明，如果在有限域上精心选择定义集，可以获得一些最佳代码。在本文中，我们基于定义集，通过使用指数和，研究了环F p + u F p ( p是奇素数)上线性码的李氏重量分布。然后，我们在灰度映射下确定这些线性码的图像的显式完全权重枚举器。还提出了一类满足Griesmer界的等重码，用于构造达到LVFC界的最佳常数复合码。

papers.title: Duplication-correcting codes
papers.authors: Andreas Lenz, Antonia Wachter-Zeh, Eitan Yaakobi
papers.abstract: The ability to store data in the DNA of a living organism has applications in a variety of areas including synthetic biology and watermarking of patented genetically-modified organisms. Data stored in this medium is subject to errors arising from various mutations, such as point mutations, indels, and tandem duplication, which need to be corrected to maintain data integrity. In this paper, we provide error-correcting codes for errors caused by tandem duplications, which create a copy of a block of the sequence and insert it in a tandem manner, i.e., next to the original. In particular, we present a family of codes for correcting errors due to tandem-duplications of a fixed length and any number of errors. We also study codes for correcting tandem duplications of length up to a given constant k, where we are primarily focused on the cases of k = 2, 3.
papers.abstract_zh: 在活生物体的DNA中存储数据的能力在许多领域都有应用，包括合成生物学和专利转基因生物体的水印。存储在这种介质中的数据易受各种突变引起的错误的影响，如点突变、indels和串联重复，需要纠正这些错误以保持数据的完整性。在这篇论文中，我们提供了针对由串联复制引起的错误的纠错码，串联复制创建了序列块的拷贝，并以串联方式将其插入，即紧挨着原始序列。特别地，我们提出了一族用于纠正由于固定长度和任意数量的错误的串联复制引起的错误的码。我们还研究了用于校正长度达到给定常数k的串联重复的码，其中我们主要关注k = 2，3的情况。
papers.title_zh: 重复校正码

papers.title: On $$\mathbb {Z}_{2^s}$$ Z 2 s -linear Hadamard codes: kernel and partial classification
papers.authors: Cristina Fernández-Córdoba, Carlos Vela, Mercè Villanueva
papers.abstract: The Z 2 s -additive codes are subgroups of Z n 2 s , and can be seen as a generalization of linear codes over Z 2 and Z 4 . A Z 2 s -linear Hadamard code is a binary Hadamard code which is the Gray map image of a Z 2 s -additive code. It is known that the dimension of the kernel can be used to give a complete classiﬁcation of the Z 4 -linear Hadamard codes. In this paper, the kernel of Z 2 s -linear Hadamard codes of length 2 t and its dimension are established for s > 2. Moreover, we prove that this invariant only provides a complete classiﬁcation for some values of t and s . The exact amount of nonequivalent such codes are given up to t = 11 for any s ≥ 2, by using also the rank.
papers.abstract_zh: Z 2 s-加法码是Z 2s的子群，可以看作是z2和Z 4上线性码的推广。Z 2 s线性哈达玛码是二进制哈达玛码，它是Z 2 s加法码的灰度映射图像。众所周知，核的维数可以用来给出Z 4线性哈达玛码的完整分类。本文建立了长度为2 t的Z 2 s线性Hadamard码的核及其维数。此外，我们证明该不变量仅针对t和s的某些值提供了完整的分类。对于任何s ≥ 2，通过使用秩，给出了t = 11时此类代码的确切数量。
papers.title_zh: 关于＄＄\ mathbb {z}_{2^s}$$ z2s-线性哈达玛码:核和部分分类

papers.title: On disjoint (v, k, k-1) difference families
papers.authors: Marco Buratti
papers.abstract: A disjoint (v, k , k − 1 ) difference family in an additive group G is a partition of G \{ 0 } into sets of size k whose lists of differences cover, altogether, every non-zero element of G exactly k − 1 times. The main purpose of this paper is to get the literature on this topic in order, since some authors seem to be unaware of each other’s work. We show, for instance, that a couple of heavy constructions recently presented as new, had been given in several equivalent forms over the last forty years. We also show that they can be quickly derived from a general nearring theory result which probably passed unnoticed by design theorists and that we restate and reprove, more simply, in terms of differences . This result can be exploited to get many inﬁnite classes of disjoint (v, k , k − 1 ) difference families; here, as an example, we present an inﬁnite class coming from the Fibonacci sequence. Finally, we will prove that if all prime factors of v are congruent to 1 modulo k , then there exists a disjoint (v, k , k − 1 ) difference family in every group, even non-abelian, of order v .
papers.abstract_zh: 加法群G中的不相交(v，k，k1)差族是G \{ 0 }划分成k个大小的集合，这些集合的差列表总共恰好覆盖G的每个非零元素k1次。本文的主要目的是整理关于这一主题的文献，因为一些作者似乎不知道彼此的工作。例如，我们表明，最近作为新建筑出现的几个重型建筑，在过去的四十年中已经以几种等价的形式出现。我们还表明，它们可以很快地从一个一般的近似理论结果中推导出来，而这个结果可能没有被设计理论家注意到，我们更简单地根据差异来重述和反驳。这个结果可以用来得到许多不相交的(v，k，k-1)差族的无限类；这里，作为一个例子，我们展示了一个来自斐波那契数列的无限类。最后，我们将证明，如果v的所有素因子都同余于1模k，那么在v阶的每个群中，甚至是非阿贝尔群中，都存在一个不相交的(v，k，k1)差族。
papers.title_zh: 关于不相交的(v，k，k-1)差族

papers.title: Optimal 2-D (n × m , 3 , 2 , 1)-optical orthogonal codes and related equi-difference conflict avoiding codes
papers.authors: Tao Feng, Lidong Wang, Xiaomiao Wang
papers.abstract: This paper focuses on constructions for optimal 2-D (n ×m, 3, 2, 1)-optical orthogonal codes with m ≡ 0 (mod 4). An upper bound on the size of such codes is established. It relies heavily on the size of optimal equi-difference 1-D (m, 3, 2, 1)-optical orthogonal codes, which is closely related to optimal equi-difference conflict avoiding codes with weight 3. The exact number of codewords of an optimal 2-D (n×m, 3, 2, 1)optical orthogonal code is determined for n = 1, 2, m ≡ 0 (mod 4), and n ≡ 0 (mod 3), m ≡ 8 (mod 16) or m ≡ 32 (mod 64) or m ≡ 4, 20 (mod 48).
papers.abstract_zh: 本文主要研究m ≡ 0 (mod 4)的最优二维(n ×m，3，2，1)光正交码的构造。建立了这种代码大小的上限。它严重依赖于最优等差一维(m，3，2，1)光正交码的大小，而最优等差冲突避免码的权值为3。对于n = 1，2，m ≡ 0 (mod 4)，以及n ≡ 0 (mod 3)，m ≡ 8 (mod 16)或m ≡ 32 (mod 64)或m ≡ 4，20 (mod 48)，确定最佳2-D (n×m，3，2，1)光正交码的确切码字数目。

papers.title: Constructing infinite families of low differential uniformity (n, m)-functions with m > n / 2
papers.authors: Claude Carlet, Xi Chen, Longjiang Qu
papers.abstract: Little theoretical work has been done on ( n , m ) -functions when n 2 < m < n , even though these functions can be used in Feistel ciphers, and actually play an important role in several block ciphers. Nyberg has shown that the differential uniformity of such functions is bounded below by 2 n − m + 2 if n is odd or if m > n 2 . In this paper, we ﬁrst characterize the differential uniformity of those ( n , m ) -functions of the form F ( x , z ) = φ( z ) I ( x ) , where I ( x ) is the ( m , m ) -inverse function and φ( z ) is an ( n − m , m ) -function. Using this characterization, we construct an inﬁnite family of differentially (cid:3) -uniform ( 2 m − 1 , m ) -functions with m ≥ 3 achieving Nyberg’s bound with equality, which also have high nonlinearity and not too low algebraic degree. We then discuss an inﬁnite family of differentially 4-uniform ( m + 1 , m ) - functions in this form, which leads to many differentially 4-uniform permutations. We also present a method to construct inﬁnite families of ( m + k , m ) -functions with low differential uniformity and construct an inﬁnite family of ( 2 m − 2 , m ) -functions with (cid:3) ≤ 2 m − 1 − 2 m − 6 + 2 for any m ≥ 8. The constructed functions in this paper may provide more choices for the design of Feistel ciphers.
papers.abstract_zh: 当n 2 < m < n时，关于(n，m)-函数的理论工作做得很少，即使这些函数可以用于Feistel密码，并且实际上在几个分组密码中起重要作用。Nyberg已经证明，如果n是奇数或者如果m > n 2，则这种函数的微分一致在2n m+2以下有界。在本文中，我们首先刻画了F ( x，z ) = φ( z ) I ( x)形式的(n，m)-函数的微分一致性，其中I ( x)是(m，m)-反函数，φ( z)是(n m，m)-函数。利用这一特征，我们构造了一个有限的差分(cid:3)-一致(2m 1，m)-函数族，其中m ≥ 3达到Nyberg的等式界，并且具有高非线性度和不太低的代数次数。然后，我们讨论这种形式的差分4一致(m + 1，m)函数的无限族，这导致许多差分4一致排列。我们还提出了一种方法来构造具有低微分均匀性的(m + k，m)函数的有限族，并构造具有(cid:3)≤2m 1 2m 6+2的(2m 2，m)函数的有限族。本文构造的函数可以为Feistel密码的设计提供更多的选择。
papers.title_zh: 构造无限族低微分一致(n，m)-函数，其中m > n / 2

papers.title: Nearly optimal robust secret sharing
papers.authors: Mahdi Cheraghchi
papers.abstract: We prove that a known general approach to improve Shamir’s celebrated secret sharing scheme; i.e., adding an information-theoretic authentication tag to the secret, can make it robust for n parties against any collusion of size $$\delta n$$δn, for any constant $$\delta \in (0, 1/2)$$δ∈(0,1/2). Shamir’s original scheme is robust for all $$\delta \in (0,1/3)$$δ∈(0,1/3). Beyond that, we employ the best known list decoding algorithms for Reed-Solomon codes and show that, with high probability, only the correct secret maintains the correct information-theoretic tag if an algebraic manipulation detection (AMD) code is used to tag secrets. This result holds in the so-called “non-rushing” model in which the n shares are submitted simultaneously for reconstruction. We thus obtain a fully explicit and robust secret sharing scheme in this model that is essentially optimal in all parameters including the share size which is $$k(1+o(1)) + O(\kappa )$$k(1+o(1))+O(κ), where k is the secret length and $$\kappa $$κ is the security parameter. Like Shamir’s scheme, in this modified scheme any set of more than $$\delta n$$δn honest parties can efficiently recover the secret. Using algebraic geometry codes instead of Reed-Solomon codes, the share length can be decreased to a constant (only depending on $$\delta $$δ) while the number of shares n can grow independently. In this case, when n is large enough, the scheme satisfies the “threshold” requirement in an approximate sense; i.e., any set of $$\delta n(1+\rho )$$δn(1+ρ) honest parties, for arbitrarily small $$\rho > 0$$ρ>0, can efficiently reconstruct the secret. From a practical perspective, the main importance of our result is in showing that existing systems employing Shamir-type secret sharing schemes can be made much more robust than previously thought with minimal change, essentially only involving the addition of a short and simple checksum to the original data.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们证明了改进Shamir著名的秘密共享方案的一种已知的一般方法；即，将信息理论认证标签添加到秘密中，可以使其对于n方抵抗大小为$ $ \δn $ $δn的任何共谋是鲁棒的，对于(0，1/2)$$δ∈(0，1/2)中的任何常数$ $ \δ。Shamir的原始方案对于(0，1/3)$$δ∈(0，1/3)中的所有$ $ \δ\都是鲁棒的。除此之外，我们采用了Reed-Solomon码的最著名的列表解码算法，并且表明，如果使用代数操作检测(AMD)码来标记秘密，则很有可能只有正确的秘密保持正确的信息论标记。这一结果在所谓的“非仓促”模型中成立，在该模型中，n个份额被同时提交用于重建。因此，我们在该模型中获得了完全显式和鲁棒的秘密共享方案，该方案在所有参数中基本上是最优的，包括份额大小为$ $ k(1+O(1))+O(\κ)$ $ k(1+O(1))+O(κ)，其中k是秘密长度，$ $ \κ$ $κ是安全参数。与Shamir的方案一样，在这个改进的方案中，任何超过$ $ \δn $ $δn个诚实方的集合都可以有效地恢复秘密。使用代数几何码代替Reed-Solomon码，份额长度可以减少到常数(仅取决于$$\delta $$δ),而份额数量n可以独立增长。在这种情况下，当n足够大时，该方案满足近似意义下的“门限”要求；即任何一组$ $ \δn(1+\ rho)$ $δn(1+ρ)诚实方，对于任意小的$$\rho > 0$$ρ>0，都可以有效地重构秘密。从实践的角度来看，我们的结果的主要重要性在于表明，使用Shamir型秘密共享方案的现有系统可以比以前认为的更健壮，并且只需要最小的改变，本质上只涉及对原始数据添加短而简单的校验和。

papers.title: New covering codes of radius R, codimension tR and $$tR+\frac{R}{2}$$, and saturating sets in projective spaces
papers.authors: Alexander A. Davydov, Stefano Marcugini, Fernanda Pambianco
papers.abstract: The length function (cid:2) q ( r , R ) is the smallest length of a q -ary linear code of codimension r and covering radius R . In this work we obtain new constructive upper bounds on (cid:2) q ( r , R ) for all R ≥ 4, r = t R , t ≥ 2, and also for all even R ≥ 2, r = t R + R 2 , t ≥ 1. The new bounds are provided by inﬁnite families of new covering codes with ﬁxed R and increasing codimension. The new bounds improve upon the known ones. We propose a general regular construction (called “Line+Ovals”) of a minimal ρ -saturating ((ρ + 1 ) q + 1 ) -set in the projective space PG ( 2 ρ + 1 , q ) for all ρ ≥ 0. Such a set corresponds to an [ Rq + 1 , Rq + 1 − 2 R , 3 ] q R locally optimal code of covering radius R = ρ + 1. Basing on combinatorial properties of these codes regarding to spherical capsules, we give constructions for code codimension lifting and obtain inﬁnite families of new surface-covering codes with codimension r = t R , t ≥ 2. In addition, we obtain new 1-saturating sets in the projective plane PG ( 2 , q 2 ) and, basing on them, construct inﬁnite code families with ﬁxed even radius R ≥ 2 and codimension r = t R + R 2 , t ≥ 1.
papers.abstract_zh: 摘要:长度函数(cid:2) q ( r，R)是余维数为R且覆盖半径为R的q元线性码的最小长度。在这篇文章中，我们得到了关于(cid:2) q ( r，R)的新的构造性上界，其中R ≥ 4，r = t R，t ≥ 2，R = tr+R ^ 2，t ≥ 1。新的界限由具有固定R和递增余维的新覆盖码的无限族提供。新的界限改进了已知的界限。我们提出射影空间PG ( 2 ρ + 1，q)中最小ρ饱和((ρ + 1 ) q + 1)集的一般正则构造(称为“直线+椭圆”)，对于所有ρ ≥ 0。这样的集合对应于覆盖半径R = ρ + 1的[ Rq + 1，Rq+12r，3 ] q R局部最优码。基于这些码关于球形胶囊的组合性质，我们给出了码余维提升的构造，并得到了余维r = t R，t ≥ 2的新表面覆盖码的无限族。此外，我们在射影平面PG ( 2，q 2)中获得了新的1-饱和集，并在此基础上构造了具有固定偶半径R ≥ 2和余维数r = t R + R 2，t ≥ 1的有限个码族。

papers.title: The order of the automorphism group of a binary q -analog of the Fano plane is at most two
papers.authors: Michael Kiermaier, Sascha Kurz, Alfred Wassermann
papers.abstract: The question if there exists a q -analog of the Fano plane is open since it was ﬁrst posed in 1972. For a putative binary q -analog of the Fano plane all automorphisms of order greater than 4 had been excluded previously. Here, it is shown with theoretical and computational methods that the order of the automorphism group of a binary q -analog of the Fano plane is either trivial or of order 2. Moreover, some groups which had been excluded by computer search in Braun et al. (Eur J Comb 51:443–457, 2016) are ruled out as automorphism group by theoretic arguments.
papers.abstract_zh: 自1972年首次提出以来，是否存在Fano平面的q模拟的问题一直悬而未决。对于一个假定的Fano平面的二进制q-模拟，所有大于4阶的自同构以前都被排除了。这里，用理论和计算方法证明了Fano平面的二元q-模拟的自同构群的阶或者是平凡的，或者是2阶的。此外，在Braun等人(Eur J Comb 51:443–457，2016)中被计算机搜索排除的一些群通过理论论证被排除为自同构群。
papers.title_zh: Fano平面的二元q-模拟的自同构群的阶至多为二

papers.title: Coding for locality in reconstructing permutations
papers.authors: Netanel Raviv, Eitan Yaakobi, Muriel Médard
papers.abstract: The problem of storing permutations in a distributed manner arises in several common scenarios, such as efficient updates of a large, encrypted, or compressed data set. This problem may be addressed in either a combinatorial or a coding approach. The former approach boils down to presenting large sets of permutations with locality, that is, any symbol of the permutation can be computed from a small set of other symbols. In the latter approach, a permutation may be coded in order to achieve locality. Both approaches must present low query complexity to allow the user to find an element efficiently. We discuss both approaches, and give a particular focus to the combinatorial one. In the combinatorial approach, we provide upper and lower bounds for the maximal size of a set of permutations with locality, and provide several simple constructions which attain the upper bound. In cases where the upper bound is not attained, we provide alternative constructions using a variety of tools, such as Reed-Solomon codes, permutation polynomials, and multi-permutations. In addition, several low-rate constructions of particular interest are discussed. In the coding approach we discuss an alternative representation of permutations, present a paradigm for supporting arbitrary powers of the stored permutation, and conclude with a proof of concept that permutations may be stored more efficiently than ordinary strings over the same alphabet.
papers.abstract_zh: 以分布式方式存储排列的问题出现在几种常见的场景中，例如大型、加密或压缩数据集的有效更新。这个问题可以用组合或编码的方法来解决。前一种方法归结为呈现具有局部性的大组排列，也就是说，排列的任何符号都可以从一小组其他符号中计算出来。在后一种方法中，为了实现局部性，可以对置换进行编码。这两种方法都必须呈现较低的查询复杂度，以允许用户高效地找到元素。我们讨论这两种方法，并特别关注组合方法。在组合方法中，我们给出了具有局部性的置换集的最大尺寸的上界和下界，并给出了几个达到上界的简单构造。在没有达到上限的情况下，我们使用各种工具提供替代构造，例如Reed-Solomon码、置换多项式和多置换。此外，还讨论了几种特别感兴趣的低费率建筑。在编码方法中，我们讨论了置换的另一种表示，提出了一个支持存储置换的任意次方的范例，并以一个概念证明结束，即置换可以比相同字母表上的普通字符串更有效地存储。
papers.title_zh: 重构排列中的局部性编码

papers.title: Z2-double cyclic codes
papers.authors: Joaquim Borges, Cristina Fernández-Córdoba, Roger Ten-Valls
papers.abstract: A binary linear code $C$ is a $\mathbb{Z}_2$-double cyclic code if the set of coordinates can be partitioned into two subsets such that any cyclic shift of the coordinates of both subsets leaves invariant the code. These codes can be identified as submodules of the $\mathbb{Z}_2[x]$-module $\mathbb{Z}_2[x]/(x^r-1)\times\mathbb{Z}_2[x]/(x^s-1).$ We determine the structure of $\mathbb{Z}_2$-double cyclic codes giving the generator polynomials of these codes. The related polynomial representation of $\mathbb{Z}_2$-double cyclic codes and its duals, and the relations between the polynomial generators of these codes are studied.
papers.abstract_zh: 二进制线性码$C$是一个$ \ mathbb { Z } _ 2 $-双循环码，如果坐标集可以分成两个子集，使得两个子集的坐标的任何循环移位都使该码保持不变。这些代码可以被识别为$ \ mathbb { z } _ 2[x]$-模块$\mathbb{z}_2[x]/(x^r-1)\times\mathbb{z}_2[x]/(x^s-1).的子模块我们确定了$ \ math bb { Z } _ 2 $-双循环码的结构，给出了这些码的生成多项式。研究了＄\ math bb { Z } _ 2 ＄-双循环码及其对偶码的相关多项式表示，以及这些码的多项式生成元之间的关系。

papers.abstract: In this work, we investigate DNA codes of odd length over the finite ring <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$R=\mathbb {Z}_{4}+v \mathbb {Z}_{4},v^{2}=v$ </tex-math></inline-formula>. Firstly, we give a map <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\Phi $ </tex-math></inline-formula> from <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$R^{n}$ </tex-math></inline-formula> to <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\{A, T, G,C\}^{2n}$ </tex-math></inline-formula>. Then cyclic codes of odd length satisfying the reverse and reverse-complement constraint are characterized over such ring. Moreover, when <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$C$ </tex-math></inline-formula> is a reverse-complement cyclic code over <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$R$ </tex-math></inline-formula>, we prove that <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\Phi (C)$ </tex-math></inline-formula> is a cyclic DNA code by using the method different from all the previously known ones, which helps us finding a new DNA code with 256 codewords. Finally, we consider the <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$GC$ </tex-math></inline-formula> content of code <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$C$ </tex-math></inline-formula> over finite ring <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\mathbb {Z}_{4} + v \mathbb {Z}_{4}$ </tex-math></inline-formula> by means of the Gray images of the minimal generating set of <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$C$ </tex-math></inline-formula>.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本工作中，我们研究了有限环上奇数长度的DNA码。首先，我们给出一个从< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ \ phi $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >到< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ \ { a，t，g,c\}^{2n}$ </tex-math > </inline-formula >的映射。那么满足逆和逆补约束的奇长循环码就刻画在这样的环上。此外，当< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ C $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >是< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ R $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >上的逆补循环码时，我们通过使用不同于所有先前已知的方法来证明< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ \ Phi(C)$ </tex-math > </inline-formula >是循环DNA码，其中最后，我们考虑有限环< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ GC $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >上< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ C $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >的代码内容，通过

papers.title: The point decomposition problem over hyperelliptic curves - Toward efficient computation of discrete logarithms in even characteristic
papers.authors: Jean-Charles Faugère, Alexandre Wallet
papers.abstract: Computing discrete logarithms is generically a difﬁcult problem. For divisor class groups of curves deﬁned over extension ﬁelds, a variant of the Index-Calculus called Decomposition attack is used, and it can be faster than generic approaches. In this situation, collecting the relations is done by solving multiple instances of the Point m -Decomposition Problem (PDP m ). An instance of this problem can be modelled as a zero-dimensional polynomial system. Solving is done with Gröbner bases algorithms, where the number of solutions of the system is a good indicator for the time complexity of the solving process. For systems arising from a PDP m context, this number grows exponentially fast with the extension degree. To achieve an efﬁcient harvesting, this number must be reduced as much as as possible. Extending the elliptic case, we introduce a notion of Summation Ideals to describe PDP m instances over higher genus curves, and compare to Nagao’s general approach to PDP m solving. In even characteristic we obtain reductions of the number of solutions for both approaches, depending on the curve’s equation. In the best cases, for a hyperelliptic curve of genus g , we can divide the number of solutions by 2 ( n − 1 )( g + 1 ) . For instance, for a type II genus 2 curve deﬁned over F 2 93 whose divisor class group has cardinality a near-prime 184 bits integer, the number of solutions is reduced from 4096 to 64. This is enough to build the matrix of relations in around 7 days with 8000 cores using a dedicated implementation. × 3 . 2 · 10 − 3 sec. = 2 . 3sec. are needed in average to ﬁnd a solution. Using 8000 cores, it then takes a bit more than 7 days to build an overdetermined matrix. We also estimate the number of operations linear algebra to around 2 63 (after efﬁcient ﬁltering steps [3][5]). Security-wise, this suggest that Type II curves are weaker than expected against Decomposition attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 计算离散对数通常是一个困难的问题。对于在扩展域上定义的除数类曲线组，使用一种称为分解攻击的指数演算变体，它比一般方法更快。在这种情况下，通过求解点m分解问题(PDP m)的多个实例来收集关系。这个问题的一个例子可以建模为零维多项式系统。求解是用Grö bner基算法完成的，其中系统的解的数量是求解过程的时间复杂度的良好指标。对于从PDP m上下文中产生的系统，这个数字随着扩展程度以指数方式快速增长。为了实现高效收割，必须尽可能减少该数量。扩展椭圆情形，我们引入求和理想的概念来描述更高亏格曲线上的PDP m实例，并与高娜求解PDP m的一般方法进行比较。在偶数特征中，根据曲线的方程，我们得到了两种方法的解的数量的减少。在最好的情况下，对于亏格为g的超椭圆曲线，我们可以将解的个数除以2(n1)(g+1)。例如，对于定义在F 2 93上的类型II亏格2曲线，其除数类组具有基数(接近素数的184位整数)，解的数量从4096减少到64。使用专用实现，这足以在大约7天内用8000个内核构建关系矩阵。× 3 .2 10 3秒。= 2 .3秒。找到一个解决方案。使用8000个内核，构建超定矩阵需要7天多一点的时间。我们还估计线性代数运算的数量约为2 63(经过有效的过滤步骤[3][5])。从安全角度来看，这表明II型曲线在抵抗分解攻击方面比预期的要弱。

papers.title: Multiset combinatorial batch codes
papers.authors: Hui Zhang, Eitan Yaakobi, Natalia Silberstein
papers.abstract: A multiset combinatorial batch code (MCBC) over vector space consists of a set of subspaces of $\mathbb{F}_{q}^{n}$, each corresponding to a server, such that requests consisting of $t$ dimensional subspaces, can be retrieved from the servers. The code is said to be regular if all the subspaces in the code have the same dimension. The aim is to find the minimum number of total storage, and also the minimum number of servers in the regular case, fixing other parameters. In this paper, we provide bounds and constructions for this new class of batch codes.
papers.abstract_zh: 向量空间上的多集组合批码(MCBC)由一组$\mathbb{F}_{q}^{n}$子空间组成，每个子空间对应于一个服务器，这样由$t$维子空间组成的请求可以从服务器中检索。如果码中的所有子空间具有相同的维数，则称该码是正则的。目标是在固定其他参数的情况下，找到总存储量的最小数量，以及正常情况下服务器的最小数量。在本文中，我们给出了这类新的批码的界和构造。

papers.title: Constructions and analysis of some efficient t - (k, n)∗-visual cryptographic schemes using linear algebraic techniques
papers.authors: Sabyasachi Dutta, Raghvendra Singh Rohit, Avishek Adhikari
papers.abstract: In this paper we put forward an efﬁcient construction, based on linear algebraic technique, of a t - ( k , n ) ∗ -visual cryptographic scheme (VCS) for monochrome images in which t participants are essential in a ( k , n ) -VCS. The scheme is efﬁcient in the sense that it only requires solving a system of linear equations to construct the required initial basis matrices. To make the scheme more efﬁcient, we apply the technique of deletion of common columns from the initial basis matrices to obtain the reduced basis matrices. However ﬁnding exact number of common columns in the initial basis matrices is a challenging problem. In this paper we deal with this problem. We ﬁrst provide a construction and analysis of t - ( k , n ) ∗ - VCS. We completely characterize the case of t - ( n − 1 , n ) ∗ -VCS, 0 ≤ t ≤ n − 1, by ﬁnding a closed form of the exact number of common columns in the initial basis matrices and thereby deleting the common columns to get the exact value of the reduced pixel expansion and relative contrast of the efﬁcient and simple scheme. Our proposed closed form for reduced pixel expansion of ( n − 1 , n ) -VCS matches with the numerical values of the optimal pixel expansions for every possible values of n that exist in the literature. We further deal with the ( n − 2 , n ) -VCS and resolve an open issue by providing an efﬁcient algorithm for grouping the system of linear equations and thereby show that our proposed algorithm works better than the existing scheme based on the linear algebraic technique. Finally we provide a bound Communicated by C. Blundo.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇论文中，我们提出了一种基于线性代数技术的用于单色图像的t - ( k，n)∫视觉加密方案(VCS)的有效构造，其中t个参与者在(k，n ) -VCS中是必要的。该方案是有效的，因为它只需要解一个线性方程组来构造所需的初始基矩阵。为了使方案更有效，我们应用从初始基矩阵中删除公共列的技术来获得简化的基矩阵。然而，在初始基矩阵中找到公共列的精确数量是一个具有挑战性的问题。在本文中，我们处理这个问题。我们首先提供t - ( k，n)∫VCS的构造和分析。我们完全描述了t-(n1，n)∑-VCS的情况，0≤t≤n1，方法是在初始基矩阵中找到精确数量的公共列的闭合形式，从而删除公共列，以获得有效和简单方案的减少的像素扩展和相对对比度的精确值。我们提出的(n1，n ) -VCS减少像素扩展的闭合形式与文献中存在的每个可能的n值的最佳像素扩展的数值相匹配。我们进一步处理(N2，n ) -VCS，并通过提供用于分组线性方程组的有效算法来解决一个公开的问题，从而表明我们提出的算法比基于线性代数技术的现有方案工作得更好。最后我们提供一个由C. Blundo传达的界限。
papers.title_zh: 利用线性代数技术构造和分析一些有效的t - (k，n)∫可视密码方案

papers.title: Characterising pointsets in PG(4, q) that correspond to conics
papers.authors: Susan G. Barwick, Wen-Ai Jackson
papers.abstract: We consider a non-degenerate conic in $\PG(2,q^2)$, $q$ odd, that is tangent to $\ell_\infty$ and look at its structure in the Bruck-Bose representation in $\PG(4,q)$. We determine which combinatorial properties of this set of points in $\PG(4,q)$ are needed to reconstruct the conic in $\PG(2,q^2)$. That is, we define a set $\C$ in $\PG(4,q)$ with $q^2$ points that satisfies certain combinatorial properties. We then show that if $q\ge 7$, we can use $\C$ to construct a regular spread $\S$ in the hyperplane at infinity of $\PG(4,q)$, and that $\C$ corresponds to a conic in the Desarguesian plane $\P(\S)\cong\PG(2,q^2)$ constructed via the Bruck-Bose correspondence.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们考虑$\PG(2,q^2)$中的非退化二次曲线$q$ odd，它与$\ell_\infty$相切，并研究它在$\PG(4，q)$中的Bruck-Bose表示中的结构。我们确定$\PG(4，q)$中的这组点的哪些组合性质是重建$\PG(2,q^2)$.二次曲线所需要的也就是说，我们在$\PG(4，q)$中用满足某些组合性质的$q^2$点定义了一个集合$\C$。然后我们证明，如果$q\ge 7$，我们可以用$\C$在$\PG(4，q)$的无穷远处的超平面中构造一个正则展开$\S$并且$\C$对应于通过Bruck-Bose对应构造的德萨格斯平面$\P(\S)\cong\PG(2,q^2)$中的一个二次曲线。
papers.title_zh: PG(4，q)中对应于二次曲线的特征点集

papers.title: Bounds and constructions for 3¯-separable codes with length 3
papers.authors: Minquan Cheng, Jing Jiang, Haiyan Li, Ying Miao, Xiaohu Tang
papers.abstract: As separable code (SC, IEEE Trans Inf Theory 57:4843-4851, 2011) and frameproof code (FPC, IEEE Trans Inf Theory 44:1897-1905, 1998) do in multimedia fingerprinting, strongly separable code (SSC, Des. Codes and Cryptogr.79:303-318, 2016) can be also used to construct anti-collusion codes. Furthermore, SSC is better than FPC and SC in the applications for multimedia fingerprinting since SSC has lower tracing complexity than that of SC (the same complexity as FPC) and weaker structure than that of FPC. In this paper, we first derive several upper bounds on the number of codewords of t-SSC. Then we focus on 3-SSC with codeword length 3, and obtain the following two main results: (1) An equivalence between an SSC and an SC. (2) An improved lower bound Ω(q + q − q) on the size of a q-ary SSC when q = q 1 for any prime power q1 ≡ 1 (mod 6), better than the before known bound ⌊ √ q⌋3, which is obtained by means of difference matrix and the known result on the subset of Fq containing no three points on a line.
papers.abstract_zh: 正如多媒体指纹中的可分离码(SC，IEEE Trans Inf Theory 57:4843-4851，2011)和防帧码(FPC，IEEE Trans Inf Theory 44:1897-1905，1998)一样，强可分离码(SSC，Des。Codes and Cryptogr.79:303-318，2016)也可用于构造抗共谋码。此外，在多媒体指纹应用中，SSC优于FPC和SC，因为SSC比SC具有更低的追踪复杂度(与FPC相同的复杂度),并且比FPC具有更弱的结构。本文首先推导了t-SSC码字个数的几个上界。然后我们研究了码字长度为3的3-SSC，得到了以下两个主要结果:(1)SSC和SC之间的等价性。(2)对于任意素数幂q1 ≡ 1 (mod 6 ),当q = q 1时，q元SSC的大小的一个改进的下界ω(q+q ),优于以前已知的界⌊ √ q⌋3，它是借助于差分矩阵和已知的关于不包含直线上三点的Fq的子集的结果得到的。

papers.authors: Xiaoqin Zhan, Shenglin Zhou
papers.abstract: This paper is a contribution to the investigation of ﬂag-transitive non-symmetric 2-designs. We prove that if D is a non-trivial non-symmetric 2- (v, k , λ) design with ( r , λ) = 1 and G ≤ Aut ( D ) is ﬂag-transitive with sporadic socle, then D must be one of following: a 2- ( 12 , 6 , 5 ) design with G = M 11 , or a 2- ( 22 , 6 , 5 ) design with G = M 22 or M 22 : 2.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文是对传递性非对称2-设计研究的贡献。我们证明了，如果D是一个非平凡非对称2- (v，k，λ)设计，其中(r，λ) = 1，G ≤ Aut ( D)是f-传递的，具有零星的socle，那么D必须是下列之一:一个2- ( 12，6，5)设计，其中G = M 11，或一个2- ( 22，6，5)设计，其中G = M 22或M 22 : 2。

papers.title: Complete (k, 3)-arcs from quartic curves
papers.authors: Daniele Bartoli, Massimo Giulietti, Giovanni Zini
papers.abstract: Complete ( k , 3 ) -arcs in projective planes over ﬁnite ﬁelds are the geometric coun-terpart of linear non-extendible Near MDS codes of length k and dimension 3. A class of inﬁnite families of complete ( k , 3 ) -arcs in PG ( 2 , q ) is constructed, for q a power of an odd prime p ≡ 2 ( mod 3 ) . The order of magnitude of k is smaller than q . This property signiﬁcantly distinguishes the complete ( k , 3 ) -arcs of this paper from the previously known inﬁnite families, whose size differs from q by at most 2 √ q .
papers.abstract_zh: 有限域上射影平面中的完全(k，3)-弧是长度为k、维数为3的线性不可扩展近MDS码的几何余数。构造了PG ( 2，q)中的一类有限族的完全(k，3)-弧，其中q是奇素数p ≡ 2 ( mod 3)的幂。k的数量级小于q。这一性质将本文的完整(k，3)-弧与之前已知的有限族显著区分开来，后者的大小与q相差最多2 √ q。

papers.title: Technical history of discrete logarithms in small characteristic finite fields - The road from subexponential to quasi-polynomial complexity
papers.authors: Antoine Joux, Cécile Pierrot
papers.abstract: Due to its use in cryptographic protocols such as the Difﬁe–Hellman key exchange, the discrete logarithm problem attracted a considerable amount of attention in the past 40 years. In this paper, we summarize the key technical ideas and their evolution for the case of discrete logarithms in small characteristic ﬁnite ﬁelds. This road leads from the original belief that this problem was hard enough for cryptographic purpose to the current state of the art where the algorithms are so efﬁcient and practical that the problem can no longer be considered for cryptographic use.
papers.abstract_zh: 由于离散对数问题在diffie–Hellman密钥交换等加密协议中的使用，它在过去40年中吸引了相当多的关注。在本文中，我们总结了小特征有限域中离散对数情况下的关键技术思想及其演变。这条道路从最初认为这个问题对于加密目的来说已经足够困难，到目前的技术水平，算法是如此有效和实用，以至于这个问题不再被考虑用于加密。

papers.title: (Secure) Linear network coding multicast - A theoretical minimum and some open problems
papers.authors: Christina Fragouli, Emina Soljanin
papers.abstract: In the multiterminal source model of Csisźar and Narayan, the communication complexity,RSK, for secret key (SK) generation is the minimum rate of communication required to achieve SK capacity. An obvious upper bound toRSK is given by RCO, which is the minimum rate of communication required for omniscience. In this paper we derive a better upper bound toRSK for the hypergraphical source model, which is a special inst ance of the multiterminal source model. The upper bound is based o n the idea of fractional removal of hyperedges. It is further shown that this upper bound can be computed in polynomial time. We conjecture that our upper bound is tight. For the special case of a graphical source model, we also give an explicit lower boun d on RSK. This bound, however, is not tight, as demonstrated by a counterexample. I. I NTRODUCTION The problem of secret key (SK) generation for multiple terminals observing i.i.d. sequences of correlated random variables was first studied by Csiszár and Narayan in [1]. The terminals are allowed to communicate interactivelyover a public noiseless channel. After the communication the term inals must agree upon an SK, secured from any eavesdropper having access to the public channel. The SK capacity, i.e., the maximum rate of secret key that can be generated was derived in [1]. A quantity of interest in the SK generation problem is thecommunication complexity 1, RSK, which is the minimum rate of communication required to generate an SK of maximum rate. Tyagi in [2, Theorem 3] has given a complete characterization of RSK for the case of two terminals. Tyagi’s arguments have been extended by [3, Theorem 2] to give a lower bound to RSK for the general multiterminal setting. This lower bound was computed and was shown to be tight for a special class of sources in [4, Theorem 4]. However, computing this lower bound for a general multiterminal source remains an open problem. Also, [3] did not provide any discussion on the tightness of this lower bound. Hence, it is useful to derive M. Mukherjee and N. Kashyap are with the Department of Electr ical Communication Engineering, Indian Institute of Science, B angalore. Email: {manuj,nkashyap }@ece.iisc.ernet.in. C. Chan and Q. Zhou are with the Institute of Network Coding at the Chinese University of Hong Kong. Email: cchan@inc.cuhk.ed u hk, qiaoqiaobupt@gmail.com. 1Our use of “communication complexity” differs from the use p revalent in the theoretical computer science literature where, follow ing [5], it refers to the total amount of communication, in bits, required to perform some distributed computation. upper bounds onRSK. The SK generation protocol in [1] goes throughomniscience , i.e., all the terminals recovering the entire information of all the other terminals. Thus, the minimum rate of communication for omniscience , RCO, is a valid upper bound onRSK. In this paper, we consider a special case of the multitermina l source model, namely the hypergraphical source model studied previously in [6] and [4]. The hypergraphical source mod el is inspired by the coded co-operative data exchange (CCDE) problem introduced in [7], and has been studied in the contex t of the “one-shot” SK generation problem, in [8]–[10]. One ca n also view the hypergraphical source model as a generalizati on of the pairwise independent network (PIN) model of [11] and [12]. The main contribution of this paper is an upper bound onRSK for the hypergraphical source model. The proof of this upper bound is based on the idea of decremental SK agreement studied in [13]. The idea is to keep on removing “randomness” from the hyperedges as long as the SK capacity does not decrease, and then use the RCO of the resulting hypergraph as an upper bound on RSK of the original hypergraph. We further show that the upper bound on RSK thus derived is at least as good asRCO. Computation of this upper bound requires the solution of a linear program, whose separation oracle perfo rms submodular function minimization. As a result the bound is computable in polynomial time. In fact, for the special case when the underlying hypergraph of the source model is a graph, the upper bound reduces to a simple expression. We believe that the upper bound is actually tight. Unfortunate ly, we do not have a proof of this yet, and therefore we state it as a conjecture. We also give a simple expression for the lower bound onRSK derived in [3, Theorem 2], for sources defined on graphs. Using this expression we are able to construct an example and show that the lower bound in [3] is not tight in general. We would like to compare and contrast our work with those of Courtade et al. in [9] and [10]. Courtade et al. consider a “one shot” model with each terminal observing only one instance of a random variable. They restrict the communication to linear functions of the source randomness . In [10, Theorem 11], they evaluate the minimum number of bits of communication required to generate a fixed number of bits of SK. It is also shown in [10, Theorem 4] that there exist sources where non-linear communication can strictly outperform any linear communications, in terms of number of the bits of communication. On the other hand, our major focus is the asymptotic model involving i.i.d. sequences of corre lated random variables at each terminal. We also do not impose any linearity restriction on the communication. However, w e consider communication complexity for generating SKs of maximum rate only, contrary to the arbitrary number of bits of SK considered by Courtade et al. It should be mentioned here that the proofs of Courtade et al. proceed by finding “inherently connected subhypergraphs” obtained by completel y removing certain hyperedges, as opposed to the “fractional removal” of hyperedges in our proofs. The difference is due o f the fact that Courtade et al. consider a one-shot model, wher eas we look into an asymptotic scenario. Therefore, restrictin g ourselves to complete removal of hyperedges only will lead to weaker upper bounds, as demonstrated in Example III.1 appearing later in the paper. The paper is organized as follows. The basic definitions and concepts are introduced in Section II. Section III prese nts our main result, an upper bound to RSK. In Section IV, we evaluate the lower bound to RSK stated in [3, Theorem 2], for the special case of graphical source models. The paper concludes with Section V.

papers.title: q-Analogs of t-wise balanced designs from Borel subgroups
papers.authors: Michael Braun
papers.abstract: A $t\text{-}(n,K,\lambda;q)$ design, also called the $q$-analog of a $t$-wise balanced design, is a set ${\mathcal B}$ of subspaces with dimensions contained in $K$ of the $n$-dimensional vector space ${\mathbb F}_q^n$ over the finite field with $q$ elements such that each $t$-subspace of ${\mathbb F}_q^n$ is contained in exactly $\lambda$ elements of ${\mathcal B}$. In this paper we give a construction of an infinite series of nontrivial $t\text{-}(n,K,\lambda;q)$ designs with $|K|=2$ for all dimensions $t\ge 1$ and all prime powers $q$ admitting the standard Borel subgroup as group of automorphisms. Furthermore, replacing $q=1$ gives an ordinary $t$-wise balanced design defined on sets.
papers.abstract_zh: A $t\text{-}(n，K，\ lambdaq)$ design，也称为$ t $-方面平衡设计的$q$-模拟，是有限域上具有$ q $个元素的$ n $-维向量空间$ { \ mathbb }的$K$中包含的维数的子空间的集合，使得$ { \ mathbb }的每个$ t $-子空间恰好包含在$ { \ mathbb }的$\lambda$个元素中。本文给出了非平凡$t\text{-}(n，K，\ lambdaq)$设计，其中$|K|=2$对于所有维数$t\ge 1$和所有素数幂$q$承认标准Borel子群为自同构群。此外，替换$q=1$给出了定义在集合上的普通$t$智能平衡设计。
papers.title_zh: Borel子群的t-平衡设计的q-相似

papers.title: On subspace codes
papers.authors: Antonio Cossidente, Francesco Pavese
papers.abstract: This paper considers vector network coding based on rank-metric codes and subspace codes. Our main result is that vector network coding can significantly reduce the required field size compared to scalar linear network coding in the same multicast network. The achieved gap between the field size of scalar and vector network coding is in q(h-2)t2/h+o(t) for any q ≥ 2 and any even h ≥ 4, where t denotes the dimension of the vector solution and h the number of messages. If h ≥ 5 is odd, then the achieved gap of the field size between the scalar network coding solution and the vector network coding solution is q(h-3)t2/(h-1)+o(t). Previously, only a gap of constant size had been shown. This implies also the same gap between the field size in linear and non-linear scalar network coding for multicast networks. The results are obtained by considering several multicast networks which are variations of the well-known combination network.
papers.abstract_zh: 本文考虑基于秩度量码和子空间码的矢量网络编码。我们的主要结果是，在相同的多播网络中，与标量线性网络编码相比，矢量网络编码可以显著减少所需的字段大小。对于任意q ≥ 2和任意偶数h ≥ 4，标量和矢量网络编码的场大小之间的差距为q(h-2)t2/h+o(t ),其中t表示矢量解的维数，h表示消息的数目。如果h ≥ 5是奇数，那么标量网络编码方案和矢量网络编码方案之间所达到的场大小的差距是q(h-3)t2/(h-1)+o(t)。以前，只显示了恒定大小的间隙。这也意味着多播网络的线性和非线性标量网络编码中的字段大小之间有相同的差距。这些结果是通过考虑几个多播网络而获得的，这些多播网络是众所周知的组合网络的变体。

papers.title: New bounds on 2-separable codes of length 2
papers.authors: Minquan Cheng, Hung-Lin Fu, Jing Jiang, Yuan-Hsun Lo, Ying Miao
papers.abstract: Let C be a code of length n over an alphabet of q letters. The descendant code desc ( C 0 ) of C 0 = { c 1 , c 2 , . . . , c t } ⊆ C is deﬁned to be the set of words x = ( x 1 , x 2 , . . . , x n ) such that x i ∈ { c 1 i , c 2 i , . . . , c ti } for all i = 1 , . . . , n . C is a t -separable code if for any two distinct C 1 , C 2 ⊆ C such that | C 1 | ≤ t , | C 2 | ≤ t , we always have desc ( C 1 ) (cid:5)= desc ( C 2 ) . The study of separable codes is motivated by questions about multimedia ﬁngerprinting for protecting copyrighted multimedia data. Let M ( t , n , q ) be the maximal possible size of such a separable code. In this paper, we provide an improved upper bound for M ( 2 , 2 , q ) by a graph theoretical approach, and a new lower bound for M ( 2 , 2 , q ) by deleting suitable points and lines from a projective plane, which coincides with the improved upper bound in some Communicated by C. J. Colbourn.
papers.abstract_zh: 设C是由q个字母组成的字母表中长度为n的代码。C 0的后代码desc(c0)= { C1，c 2，.。。，c t } ⊆ C被定义为单词x =(x ^ 1，x ^ 2，.。。，x ^ n)使得x ^ I∈{ c ^ 1i，c ^ 2i，.。。，c ti }对于所有i = 1，.。。，n . C是t-可分码如果对于任意两个不同的C 1，C 2 ⊆ C使得| C 1 | ≤ t，| C 2 | ≤ t，我们总是有desc ( C 1 ) (cid:5)= desc ( C 2)。对可分离代码的研究是由关于保护受版权保护的多媒体数据的多媒体指纹的问题所激发的。设M ( t，n，q)是这种可分码的最大可能尺寸。本文用图论的方法给出了M ( 2，2，q)的一个改进的上界，并通过从射影平面中删除适当的点和线给出了M ( 2，2，q)的一个新的下界，它与C. J. Colbourn的一些改进的上界相一致。

papers.title: Constructing self-dual codes over Fq[u]/(ut)
papers.authors: R. Alfaro, K. Dhul-Qarnayn
papers.abstract: In this work, we describe a construction for self-dual codes in which we employ group rings and reverse circulant matrices. By applying the construction directly over different alphabets, and by employing the well known extension and neighbor methods we were able to obtain extremal binary self-dual codes of different lengths of which some have parameters that were not known in the literature before. In particular, we constructed three new codes of length 64, twenty-two new codes of length 68, twelve new codes of length 80 and four new codes of length 92.
papers.abstract_zh: 在这篇文章中，我们描述了一个自对偶码的构造，其中我们使用了群环和逆循环矩阵。通过在不同的字母表上直接应用该构造，并且通过使用众所周知的扩展和邻近方法，我们能够获得不同长度的极值二进制自对偶码，其中一些具有文献中以前不知道的参数。特别地，我们构造了三个长度为64的新代码、二十二个长度为68的新代码、十二个长度为80的新代码和四个长度为92的新代码。
papers.title_zh: 在Fq[u]/(ut)上构造自对偶码

papers.title: Quasi-abelian codes
papers.authors: Somphong Jitman, San Ling
papers.abstract: A class of self-dual quasi-abelian codes of index 2 over any finite field <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$F$ </tex-math></inline-formula> is introduced. By counting the number of such codes and the number of the codes in this class whose relative minimum weights are small, such codes are proved to be asymptotically good provided −1 is a square in <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$F$ </tex-math></inline-formula>. Moreover, a class of self-orthogonal quasi-abelian codes of index 2 is defined; and such codes always exist. In a way similar to that for self-dual quasi-abelian codes of index 2, it is proved that these self-orthogonal quasi-abelian codes of index 2 are asymptotically good.
papers.abstract_zh: 引入了任意有限域< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ F $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >上的一类指数为2的自对偶拟阿贝尔码。通过计算此类代码的数量以及此类中相对最小权重较小的代码的数量，可以证明此类代码是渐近好的，前提是1是< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ F $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >中的平方。此外，定义了一类指数为2的自正交准阿贝尔码；而且这样的代码一直存在。以类似于指数为2的自对偶拟阿贝尔码的方式，证明了这些指数为2的自正交拟阿贝尔码是渐近好的。
papers.title_zh: 准阿贝尔码

papers.title: On the bounds and achievability about the ODPC of GRM(2,m)∗over prime fields for increasing message length
papers.authors: Xiaogang Liu, Yuan Luo
papers.abstract: The optimum distance proﬁles of linear block codes were studied for increasing or decreasing message length while keeping the minimum distances as large as possible, especially for Golay codes and the second-order Reed–Muller codes, etc. Cyclic codes have more efﬁcient encoding and decoding algorithms. In this paper, we investigate the optimum distance proﬁles with respect to the cyclic subcode chains (ODPCs) of the punctured generalized second-order Reed–Muller codes GRM ( 2 , m ) ∗ which were applied in Power Control in OFDM Modulations, in channels with synchronization, and so on. For this, two standards are considered in the inverse dictionary order, i.e., for increasing message length. Four lower bounds and upper bounds on ODPC are presented, where the lower bounds almost achieve the corresponding upper bounds in some sense. The discussions are over nonbinary prime ﬁelds.
papers.abstract_zh: 研究了线性分组码的最佳距离分布，以增加或减少消息长度，同时保持最小距离尽可能大，特别是对于Golay码和二阶Reed–Muller码等。循环码具有更高效的编码和解码算法。在本文中，我们研究了删截广义二阶Reed–Muller码GRM ( 2，m)∫的循环子码链(ODPCs)的最佳距离分布，这些码应用于OFDM调制、同步信道等的功率控制。为此，以相反的字典顺序考虑两个标准，即增加消息长度。给出了ODPC的四个下界和上界，这些下界在某种意义上几乎达到了相应的上界。讨论是在非二进制素数域上进行的。
papers.title_zh: 素数域上增加消息长度的GRM(2，m)∫ODPC的界和可实现性

papers.title: The completion determination of optimal (3, 4)-packings
papers.authors: Jingjun Bao, Lijun Ji
papers.abstract: A ( 3 , 4 ) -packing consists of an n -element set X and a collection of 4-element subsets of X , called blocks , such that every 3-element subset of X is contained in at most one block. The packing number of quadruples d ( 3 , 4 , n ) denotes the number of blocks in a maximum ( 3 , 4 ) -packing, which is also the maximum number A ( n , 4 , 4 ) of codewords in a code of length n , constant weight 4, and minimum Hamming distance 4. In this paper the undecided 21 packing numbers A ( n , 4 , 4 ) are shown to be equal to Johnson bound J ( n , 4 , 4 ) ( = (cid:2) n 4 (cid:2) n − 13 (cid:2) n − 22 (cid:3)(cid:3)(cid:3) ) .
papers.abstract_zh: (3，4 ) -packing由一个n元集合X和一个X的4元子集(称为块)的集合组成，使得X的每个3元子集包含在至多一个块中。四元组的打包数d ( 3，4，n)表示最大(3，4)打包中的块数，这也是长度为n、恒定重量为4且最小汉明距离为4的码中码字的最大数量A ( n，4，4)。在本文中，未定的21个包装数A ( n，4，4)被证明等于Johnson界J ( n，4，4)(=(cid:2)n4(cid:2)n13(cid:2)n22(cid:3)(cid:3)(cid:3))。

papers.title: On point-transitive and transitive deficiency one parallelisms of PG (3, 4)
papers.authors: Svetlana Topalova, Stela Zhelezova
papers.abstract: Aparallelismin PG ( n , q ) ispoint-transitiveifithasanautomorphismgroupwhich is transitive on the points. If the automorphism group ﬁxes one spread and is transitive on the remaining spreads, the parallelism corresponds to a transitive deﬁciency one parallelism. It is known that there are three types of spreads in PG ( 3 , 4 ) —regular, subregular and aregular. A parallelism is regular if all its spreads are regular. In PG ( 3 , 4 ) no point-transitive parallelisms, no regular ones, and no transitive deﬁciency one parallelisms have been known. Both point-transitive parallelisms and transitive deﬁciency one parallelisms must have automorphisms of order 5. We construct all 32,048 nonisomorphic parallelisms with automorphisms of order 5 and classify them by the orders of their automorphism groups and by the types of their spreads.Thereare31,832parallelismswithanautomorphismgroupﬁxingexactlyonespread. Onlyforfourofthemtheautomorphismgroupistransitiveontheremainingspreads.Among theparallelismsweconstructtherearenoregularones.Thereare4,124parallelismswith automorphismsoforder5withoutﬁxedpoints,butnoneofthemispoint-transitive.
papers.abstract_zh: PG ( n，q)中的平行性是点可迁的，如果它是一个在点上可迁的自同构群。如果自同构群限定了一个展布，并且在剩余的展布上是传递的，则并行度对应于传递的亏1并行度。众所周知，PG ( 3，4)中有三种类型的扩散——规则的、次规则的和不规则的。如果一个平行度的所有扩散都是正则的，那么这个平行度就是正则的。在PG ( 3，4)中，没有已知的点传递平行、正则平行和传递亏量平行。点传递平行性和传递亏一平行性都必须具有5阶自同构。我们构造了所有32，048个具有5阶自同构的非同构平行体，并根据它们的自同构群的阶和它们的展式类型对它们进行了分类。有31，832个与自动形态组完全重叠的平行列表。onlyforfourofthmtheautomorphismgroupistrassitivonthermainingspreads。在平行结构中有不规则结构。有4124个没有浮点的自同构序列，但没有一个是错点传递的。
papers.title_zh: PG (3，4)的点传递和传递亏量一平行性

papers.title: Permutation decoding of ℤ2ℤ4-linear codes
papers.authors: José Joaquín Bernal, Joaquim Borges, Cristina Fernández-Córdoba, Mercè Villanueva
papers.abstract: An alternative permutation decoding method is described which can be used for any binary systematic encoding scheme, regardless whether the code is linear or not. Thus, the method can be applied to some important codes such as Z2Z4-linear codes, which are binary and, in general, nonlinear codes in the usual sense. For this, it is proved that these codes allow a systematic encoding scheme. As a particular example, this permutation decoding method is applied to some Hadamard Z2Z4-linear codes.
papers.abstract_zh: 描述了一种替代的置换解码方法，该方法可用于任何二进制系统编码方案，而不管代码是否是线性的。因此，该方法可以应用于一些重要的码，例如z2z 4-线性码，它是二进制的，并且通常是通常意义上的非线性码。为此，证明了这些码允许系统的编码方案。作为一个特殊的例子，这种置换译码方法被应用于一些Hadamard Z2Z4线性码。

papers.title: Improving algebraic attacks on stream ciphers based on linear feedback shift register over $$\mathbb {F}_{2^k}$$ F 2 k
papers.authors: Sondre Rønjom
papers.abstract: In this paper we investigate univariate algebraic attacks on ﬁlter generators over extension ﬁelds F q = F 2 n with focus on the Welch–Gong (WG) family of stream ciphers. Our main contribution is to reduce the general algebraic attack complexity on such cipher by prov-ing new and lower bounds for the spectral immunity of such ciphers. The spectral immunity is the univariate analog of algebraic immunity and instead of measuring degree of multiples of a multivariate polynomial, it measures the minimum number of nonzero coefﬁcients of a multiple of a univariate polynomial. In particular, there is an algebraic degeneracy in these constructions, which, when combined with attacks based on low-weight multiples over F q , provides much more efﬁcient attacks than over F 2 . With negligible computational complexity, our best attack breaks the primitive WG-5 if given access to 4 kilobytes of keystream, break WG-7 if given access to 16 kilobytes of keystream and break WG-8 if given access to half a megabyte of keystream. Our best attack on WG-16 targeted at 4G-LTE is less practical, and requires 2 103 computational complexity and 2 61 bits of keystream. In all instances, we signiﬁcantly lower both keystream and computational complexity in comparison to previous estimates. On a side note, we resolve an open problem regarding the rank of a type of equation systems used in algebraic attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本文中，我们研究了扩展域F q = F 2 n上对滤波器生成器的单变量代数攻击，重点是Welch–Gong(WG)系列流密码。我们的主要贡献是通过为这种密码的谱免疫性提供新的下界，降低了这种密码的一般代数攻击的复杂性。光谱抗扰度是代数抗扰度的一元模拟，它不是测量多元多项式的倍数，而是测量一元多项式倍数的最小非零系数。特别地，在这些构造中存在代数退化，当与基于F ^ q上的低权重倍数的攻击结合时，提供比F ^ 2上更有效的攻击。在计算复杂度可以忽略不计的情况下，我们的最佳攻击是:如果给定对4千字节密钥流的访问，则破解原始WG-5；如果给定对16千字节密钥流的访问，则破解WG-7；如果给定对半兆字节密钥流的访问，则破解WG-8。我们针对4G-LTE对WG-16的最佳攻击不太实用，需要2 103的计算复杂度和2 61比特的密钥流。在所有情况下，与之前的估计相比，我们显著降低了密钥流和计算复杂度。另外，我们解决了一个关于代数攻击中使用的一类方程组的秩的公开问题。
papers.title_zh: 基于线性反馈移位寄存器改进流密码的代数攻击

papers.title: On some permutation binomials and trinomials over $$\mathbb {F}_{2^n}$$ F 2 n
papers.authors: Srimanta Bhattacharya, Sumanta Sarkar
papers.abstract: In this work, we completely characterize (1) permutation binomials of the form x 2 n − 1 2 t − 1 + 1 + ax ∈ F 2 n [ x ] , n = 2 s t , a ∈ F ∗ 2 2 t , and (2) permutation trinomials of the form x 2 s + 1 + x 2 s − 1 + 1 + α x ∈ F 2 t [ x ] , where s , t are positive integers. The ﬁrst result, which was our primary motivation, is a consequence of the second result. The second result may be of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 在本工作中，我们完全刻画了(1)x 2n 1 2t 1+1 ax∈F 2n[x]形式的置换二项式，n = 2 s t，a∈F∫2 2t，和(2)x 2s+1+x 2s 1+1+αx∈F 2t[x]形式的置换三项式，其中s，t是正整数。第一个结果是我们的主要动机，是第二个结果的结果。第二个结果可能是独立的利益。

papers.title: Antiderivative functions over $$\mathbb {F}_{2^n}$$ F 2 n
papers.authors: Valentin Suder
papers.abstract: Partially APN functions attract researchers’ particular interest recently. It plays an important role in studying APN functions. In this paper, based on the multivariate method and resultant elimination, we propose several new inﬁnite classes of 0-APN power functions over F 2 n . Furthermore, two inﬁnite classes of 0-APN power functions x d over F 2 n are characterized completely where (2 k − 1) d ≡ 2 m − 1 (mod 2 n − 1) or (2 k + 1) d ≡ 2 m + 1 (mod 2 n − 1) for some positive integers n, m, k . These inﬁnite classes of 0-APN power functions can explain some examples of exponents of Table 1 in [5].
papers.abstract_zh: 近年来，部分APN函数引起了研究者的特别兴趣。它在研究APN函数中起着重要的作用。在本文中，基于多元方法和结式消去法，我们提出了几个新的有限类F ^ 2n上的0-APN幂函数。此外，F ^ 2n上的两个有限类0-APN幂函数x ^ d被完全刻画，其中对于某些正整数n，m， 这些无限类的0-APN幂函数可以解释[5]中表1的指数的一些例子。

papers.title: On the snake-in-the-box codes for rank modulation under Kendall's τ -metric
papers.authors: Xiang Wang, Fang-Wei Fu
papers.abstract: For a Gray code in the scheme of rank modulation for flash memories, the codewords are permutations, and two consecutive codewords are obtained using a push-to-the-top operation. We consider the snake-in-the-box code under Kendall's τ-metric, which is a Gray code capable of detecting one Kendall's τ-error. We answer two open problems posed by Horovitz and Etzion. First, we prove the validity of a construction given by them, resulting in a snake of size M2n+1 = ((2n + 1)!/2) - 2n + 1. Second, we come up with a different construction aiming at a larger snake of size M2n+1 = ((2n + 1)!/2) - 2n + 3. The construction is applied successfully to S7.
papers.abstract_zh: 对于闪速存储器的秩调制方案中的格雷码，码字是置换的，并且两个连续的码字是使用推到顶部操作获得的。我们考虑Kendallτ-度量下的盒中蛇码，它是一种能够检测一个Kendallτ-错误的格雷码。我们回答了Horovitz和Etzion提出的两个公开问题。首先，我们证明他们给出的一个构造的有效性，得出大小为M2n+1 = ((2n + 1)的蛇！/2) - 2n + 1。第二，我们提出了一种不同的结构，针对的是尺寸为M2n+1 = ((2n + 1)的更大的蛇！/2) - 2n + 3。该结构已成功应用于S7。
papers.title_zh: Kendall度量下秩调制的盒中蛇码
